text: melum, iman kontavarkalukku hpir'avnin manaiviyai allah utaranamaka kurukiran. Avar"iraiva! Enakkaka unnitattil, cuvarkkattil oru vittaik kattit taruvayaka! Innum hpir'avnai vittum, avan ceyalkalai vittum ennai kapparruvayaka! Innum aniyayakkara camukattaritamiruntum ennaik kapparruvayaka" enru (pirarttittuk) kurinar
